name: Keyboard Sports
description:
ENTER the tournament as an apprentice of Master QWERTY. Learn to CTRL all keys - not just WASD. Become a keyboard master today!

In a time where new gadgets are invented every day, this is Tribandâ€™s final tribute to the keyboard before it becomes extinct. This game will never be available on PlayStation, Xbox, iOS, or Android.

Play it today while you still have a keyboard.
